title: Arjun Verma - Software engineer, founder, and amateur philosopher
description: I'm Arjun, a software engineer and entrepreneur based in Gurgaon, India.
mainHeading: Software engineer, founder, and amateur philosopher.
intro: I'm Arjun, a software engineer and entrepreneur based in Gurgaon, India. I'm the Co-founder and CTO of Hetu Labs, where we develop technologies that empower Small and Medium-sized Businesses (SMBs) by helping them scale their revenue with tailored software solutions. Occasionaly, i also work as a freelance software consultant.
visionStatement: ðŸ”¥ In light of AI's advancement, I hope to witness a future where software development is commoditized and democratized for everyone, and I aim to be an integral part of this change.
visionLinkText: software development is commoditized and democratized for everyone
newsletterDescription: Get notified when I publish something new, and unsubscribe at any time.
